content: this is a summary of a legal case in italy the court involved is the first civil section and the individuals present are the president the judge rel and another judge the case is about a joint divorce action where the plaintiffs have requested the termination of their marriage and have agreed on the terms the court has granted their request as all legal requirements have been met the plaintiffs have also agreed on various conditions regarding the care of their children financial support visitation rights and holiday arrangements they have also agreed on the use of their dwelling and the division of property the court has found these agreements to be in the best interest of the children and has made them the basis of its decision the plaintiffs are responsible for the costs of the legal proceedings the tribunal has ruled on a joint appeal by a married couple and the marriage will be terminated according to the agreed conditions the judgment will be sent to the clerks office for a certified copy to be made and for necessary notations to be made by the registrar of the municipality the decision was made by the council chamber on 13102017 with the judge extending the ruling
